attributes.action: A NationW.Committee of10,3 Con.3 Labor &.1Fm Wales,1Scotland&1 N.Ireland&N.Farag
attributes.additional_details: NO need for extending Article 50 ,,dis Committee to Re-Negotiate wif teh EU. in Extensive(24/7, Camping) for 2 weeks, one week in Brussels and teh second week in London. They Don't Wrap a Deal unless report it to teh Parliament. No Deal must Be Considered if teh EU Don't Negotiate Fairly...? What we want FAIR DEAL... But we Prefer not to Pay Any what so-called divorce Bill, wifout Solid Trade deal wif teh Whole EU Member countries & No BACKSTOPS of any Kind...
attributes.background: Committee of 10 Members,3 Conservative(Boris Johnson+Jacob Res-Mogg+Andrea Leadsom), +3 Labour to be named by Jeremy Corbyn ,1 From outside teh UK Parliament (Nigel Farag),1 from Wales,1 From Scotland &1 from Northern Ireland. 2 Advisers from teh Government Legal Office & A National Security Adviser

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
